pci_databases_backups_restore_descriptio: Restoring a backup overwrites the information currently saved on your cluster. This operation may result in a loss of data.
pci_databases_backups_restore_backup_suc: The request to restore the {{name}} backup ({{date}}) has been created.
pci_databases_backups_restore_pit_succes: The request to restore the service to the date {{date}} has been created.
pci_databases_backups_restore_restore_mo: Select the restore point from which the service will be restored.
